post.desc:
The reference is [**this anime.**](https://crayonshinchan.fandom.com/wiki/Hiroshi_Nohara:_Style_of_Noon_Meal) 

Now that I think about it... Crayon Shin-chan is definitely not aimed at kids. ü§® Yeah... I've always felt sorta detached when I watched it as a kid. Like, there are definitely a lot of things that kids won't pick up, but adults will definitely do.
